In this case, the <code>YAML</code> shou.<code>age</code>: exact age or age range, e.g. "15"

In this case, the <code>YAML</code> shou.<code>background</code>: background story or origin, in Markdown format.

In this case, the <code>YAML</code> shou.<code>physical_appearance</code>: physical appearance, e.g. eye color, hair color, height, weight

In this case, the <code>YAML</code> shou.<code>species</code>: species or other classification of the character

background.origin: The character was born in a small town by the coast.
